channel.title: TIP- Getting a cool and easy phone number!
channel.description: When you move house or for some reason want a new phone number, when the telephone company are telling you your new number , say you are dislecsik (how the hell u meant to spell that word lol) anyways they give you really easy to remember numbers. I havent tried this personally but my mate tried it and got 222 555 as his number lol!

item.title: TIP- Getting a cool and easy phone number!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Path To Pain:

Yes it is all good saying that you can get an easy phone number but you have to produce documents to prove that you are dyslexic, this may be difficult if you are not dyslexic wouldnt it!

Because it’s really worth the trouble of the phone company rep to verify your papers instead of just giving it to you.

Read full topic
item.source: TIP- Getting a cool and easy phone number!

item.title: TIP- Getting a cool and easy phone number!
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“bumr055, post:3, topic:18343”]is (dislecsia ??spelling?? [stupid word lol]) somthing that you would have some cxertification or some way they can tell if you are? because i wouldent want to do this and them be like “ok whats your ub3Rlexia number.” if thta happends i tell them strait up im retarded.[/quote] no its not. When in school you see a psycyotrist(sp) and the give you a certificate giving you special privlages in school(usealy extra time on test.) But i dont have a certificate saying that im dyslexic that i carryy with me everwhere.

item.title: TIP- Getting a cool and easy phone number!
item.dc:creator: @rob1601 rob1601
item.description:
@rob1601 wrote:

you can aks for an easy one any way. You do not have to be dyslectic and dyslexic is the name of the person has it. Also people who suffer from dyslexia can get various items that can be used to make their life easier with numbers. Many people can live a normal life with dyslexia and can often over come obsticals and are as successful as any one else. Also the phone companies give random generated phone numbers out which usually take a cycle of 50 years to come back once the phone line has been diconnected (My uncle works for British Telecom). I don’t know what they do in the USA but i would think they do exactly the same thing.

You would say i have dyslexia
or you woud say i am dyslexic

not i am dyslexia
or i have dyslexic

Read full topic
